<template>
  <node-view-wrapper class="tags">
    {{ text }}
  </node-view-wrapper>
</template>

<script>
import { nodeViewProps, NodeViewWrapper } from '@tiptap/vue-2'

export default {
  name: "ComponentTagHighlight",

  data() {
    return {
      text: this.node.attrs.text,
    }
  },
  
  props: nodeViewProps,
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
